entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9603] It is expected that TreasuryShares with a value of 52,194,000 reported in the network role https://www.vicat.com/role/BILANCONSOLIDE should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:TreasurySharesMember and a reported value of -52,018,000 multiplied by -1. This value appears in the network role https://www.vicat.com/role/VCPCONSOLIDE. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:TreasuryShares fact are:
Period : 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of TreasuryShares : -3 Decimals of Equity : -3 Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/9695009YI1863TOVDP79/2021-12-31/ESEF/FR/0/9695009YI1863TOVDP79-2021-12-31-fr.zip/9695009YI1863TOVDP79-2021-12-31-fr/reports/9695009YI1863TOVDP79-2021-12-31-fr.xhtml 782
